channel.title: PI client runner isn't working
channel.description:
Orical-X V2 is a PI server i downloaded and im trying to run the client but it isn't running. Their is something that is not pointing to a file. Everytime i run the client it says Press any key to continue . . . The client runner batch file code is:
@echo off javaw -cp bin -Xms812m -Xmx1024m client 10 0 highmem members 32 pause
